name: Duelity
description:
Load three bullets into your revolver. To do so press the key when the rotating arrow points to the white slots. Oh, and you surely want to be faster than your opponent.  

Controls 

Left Player: Left Arrow

Right Player: Right Arrow

Credits

Code: Sven Schäfer
Art: Lena Voß.

Font: Marlboro by Dieter Steffmann

Audio:
Western Bass, CC-A, https://freesound.org/s/581415/
